alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 14 at 2:45AM AKST until November 14 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches with storn total accumulation 6 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Northeastern Brooks Range. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting up to 25 mph at times will cause blowing snow and reduce visibilities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
